suppress.notes: Temporarily suppress CVE-2022-38752 and CVE-2022-38751. Fix is available in snakeyaml-1.32 but database still reporting as false positive https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4839 More info on the fix here https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/issues/531/stackoverflow-oss-fuzz-47081
